name: Pocket
0:
”Alexa, tell Pocket to get articles.”
”Alexa, tell Pocket to play the first article.”
”Alexa, tell Pocket to play the article about 'Polar Bears.'”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pocket
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pocket helps you capture content that compels, inspires, or fascinates you. With the Pocket skill, you can listen to your recently saved articles aloud, so you can enjoy your saved articles while you’re doing chores around the house, or anywhere else you have an Echo device or Alexa app.

Remember a key-word from the title of a recent article you've saved? Try asking "Alexa, tell Pocket to play the article about ___" or if you don't remember, try asking "Alexa, tell Pocket to get my articles" and you'll get a list of your most recently saved articles to choose from.

To use the Pocket skill, you'll need to login with your Pocket account email and password and have at least one article saved to your Pocket. Don't have an account yet? Create an account at www.getpocket.com to get started.
